thread.title: Arsenal midfielder Mesut Ozil currently carrying a back injury but should be fit for Liverpool clash
thread.title_full: Arsenal midfielder Mesut Ozil currently carrying a back injury but should be fit for Liverpool clash

author: leeastley
title: Arsenal midfielder Mesut Ozil currently carrying a back injury but should be fit for Liverpool clash
text:
Ozil sidelined Arsenal midfielder Mesut Ozil currently carrying a back injury but should be fit for Liverpool clash 
The Gunners star has been criticised for some lacklustre performances in recent weeks but reports suggest a back problem could be partly to blame By LEE ASTLEY MESUT OZIL has been battling a back injury for some time, according to reports. 
The Arsenal ace has faced mounting criticism over his lacklustre performances in recent months. AP:Associated Press Mesut Ozil was slatted by fans after Arsenal were thrashed 5-1 by Bayern Munich Arsenal star Mesut Ozil stars in the latest advert for Mercedes Benz cars 
The former Real Madrid star has been sounded out by angry Gooners who believe his sometimes 'non-existent' in games. 
Wenger then sanctioned some time off for Ozil to recover which is why he was not in the squad for their 2-0 win against Sutton in the FA Cup on Monday. AP:Associated Press Mesut Ozil has been carrying a back problem and has been given time off to recover Getty Images Mesut Ozil was accused of being non-existent in Arsenal's 3-1 loss to Chelsea 

Ozil was given more time off than the rest of the squad to fully recover by seeing family in Germany and then Turkey. 
The Gunners do not play again until they travel to Liverpool on March 4 in the Premier League. 
But Wenger is expected to welcome back Ozil to training at the end of this week with the hope that he has fully recovered. related stories Missing Mesut Mesut Ozil will miss Arsenal's FA Cup clash with Sutton after posting picture of himself on a plane just one hour after training selfie Still missing, mesut? Arsene Wenger looks seriously stressed as he leads Arsenal through their Sutton preparations... but where is Mesut Ozil? STOP BLAMING HIM Mesut Ozil believes he is being used as a scapegoat for Arsenal's poor form according to his agent ANOTHER FINE MES Mesut Ozil's pathetic pressing summed up Arsenal's dismal display against Bayern FOOTBALL WHISPERS Mesut Ozil's alarming drop in form highlighted during Arsenal's 2-0 win over Hull - and why Arsene Wenger should be worried BATTLE CRY Bayern Munich warrior Arturo Vidal says he is gunning for Arsenal stars Alexis Sanchez and Mesut Ozil Getty Images Mesut Ozil is expected to be fit for Arsenal's trip to Liverpool on March 4 Sutton United 0-2 Arsenal : Suttonâ€™s magical FA Cup run is ended in gritty encounter 
Ozil has reportedly been playing through pain with back spasms which has caused his form to dip dramatically. 
But the 2014 World Cup winner is expected to be fit for the trip to Anfield and the return leg of the Champions League against Bayern three days later.
